index.title: Google Fonts On-premise

head.author: Thomas Bartscherer [thomas@bartscherer.io]
head.description: This is a tool which acts as a proxy for Google Fonts

index.headline: Google Fonts On-premise
index.introduction: This software provides a proxy for downloading fonts from Google Fonts. If you embed fonts from Google on your website via fonts.googleapis.com, you can replace the fonts.googleapis.com URLs in your source code with the URL of this application in the CSS link tags and your visitors will no longer download the fonts from Google's servers, but from this application. If you want to host this application yourself, please click here for instructions.
index.disclaimer: All fonts provided through this application are the intellectual property of Google and the individual font designers. Here you can view the terms of use.
index.btnConvertTitle: Convert this link into a GFO URL
index.btnDownloadTitle: Download as a bundle of CSS and font files to embed in your application
index.privacy: Privacy policy of the service provider
index.credits: GFO is free software developed by Bartscherer Software
